pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analytical Calculation of Basket Trial Operating Characteristics // Analytically calculates the operating characteristics of single-stage and two-stage basket trials with equal sample sizes using the power prior design by Baumann et al. (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2309.06988 and the design by Fujikawa et al. (2020) doi:10.1002/bimj.201800404.
